text: Ronald Kirk (born June 27, 1954) is an American lawyer and politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party who served as the United States Trade Representative from 2009 to 2013 and the 57th Mayor of Dallas from 1995 to 2002. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:United States Trade Representatives Category:Mayors of Dallas Category:Politicians from Austin, Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Austin Category:Lawyers from Dallas Category:African-American politicians
title: Ron Kirk
